decision_conditions: The amended development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: Drawing numbers for Job Number 16043: (03)-P-S000 Revision PL2; (01)-P- S001Revision PL1; (01)-P-S002 Revision PL1; (03)-E-220 Revision PL3; (03)-E-221 Revision PL2; (03)-E-200 Revision PL4; (03)-E-201 Revision PL5; (03)-E-202 Revision PL4; (03)-E-203 Revision PL4; (03)-E-204 Revision PL4; (03)-E-205 Revision PL4; (03)-E-206 Revision PL4; (03)-E-207 Revision PL5; (03)-P-0B0 Revision PL3; (03)-P-0G0 Revision PL4; (03)-P-0M0 Revision PL4; (03)-P-001 Revision PL5; (03)-P-002 Revision PL5; (03)-P-011 Revision PL4; (03)-P-012 Revision PL4; (03)-P-013 Revision PL4; (03)-P-015 Revision PL4; (03)-P-016 Revision PL4; (03)-P-022 Revision PL4; (03)-P-023 Revision PL4; (03)-P-0R0 Revision PL4; NMA Report dated May 2023 prepared by Darling Associates Limited; 769-FH-XX-00-DP-L-101 Revision P1; 769-FH-XX-ZZ-DP-L-102 Revision P1; Landscape NMA Report dated May 2023 prepared by Farrer Huxley; (03)-X-100 Revision PL1; (03)-X-101 Revision PL1; (03)-X-102 Revision PL1; (03)-X-103 Revision PL1; (03)-E-250 Revision PL1; (03)-E-251 Revision PL1; (03)-E-252 Revision PL1; (03)-E-256 Revision PL1; (03)-E-257 Revision PL1; (03)-E-258 Revision PL1; (03)-E-262 Revision PL2; (03)-E-263 Revision PL2; (03)-E-264 Revision PL2; (03)-E-268 Revision PL1; (03)-E-269 Revision PL1 and (03)-E-270 Revision PL1 all as prepared by Darling Associates Limited; Documents titled: Design & Access Statement (Incorporating landscape proposals and public realm) dated February 2018 and Design and Access Statement Addendum, Revision B dated November 2020 both as prepared by Darling Associates Limited; Planning Statement incorporating Retail Statement dated February 2018 and Planning Statement Addendum dated August 2020 both as prepared by RPS; Statement of Community Involvement (SCI) dated June 2017 and Addendum to SCI dated 27th February 2018 both as prepared by Polity; Inclusive Access Statement dated June 2017 as prepared by Access Design; Environmental Statement (ES) Volumes 1 and 2 and Non-Technical Summary dated June 2017; Environmental Statement Addendum, Non-Technical Summary Addendum, ES Addendum Appendix 1 Air Quality Assessment and ES Addendum Appendix 2 Supplementary Geo-Environmental Site Investigation dated August 2020 and updated Addendum and Non-Technical Summary dated November 2020 all as prepared by RSK; Addendum to the ES including an updated Transport Statement, Framework Travel Plan, Delivery and Servicing Management Plan and Waste management Plan (Appendix J) as prepared by RSK and Peter Brett Associates Ltd; Metering Strategy Report dated June 2017 as prepared by AECOM; Detailed Daylight and Sunlight 'Light Within' Report dated June 2017 as prepared by GVA Schatunowski Brooks; 'Daylight and Sunlight: 'Light Within' Report - Addendum, reference GF05/02B904845 dated 27 August 2020 as prepared by Avison Young; Construction Management and Logistics Plan dated June 2017 as prepared by InnC and document titled GLA Design Considerations dated October 2017 as prepared by Darling Associates Limited; Drainage Strategy, document reference 4696_RBG_ZZ_ZZ_RP_CV_00001 Revision P04 dated 2 December 2020 as prepared by Robert Bird & Partners Limited; Urban Greening Factor dated August 2020 as prepared by Farrer Huxley; Application covering letter and Description of Development Note dated 25 August 2020 both as prepared by RPS; Sustainability Statement, document reference 5717_CBC_RGV_RP_Z_002_P02 Revision 2 dated 31 July 2020 as prepared by Cudd Bentley Consulting Limited; Energy Statement, document reference 5717_CBC_IF_RP_Z_002_P02 Revision 2 dated 31 July 2020 as prepared by Cudd Bentley Consulting Limited; BREEAM Pre-assessment Report, document reference 5717_CBC_SH_RP_Z_001_P02 Revision 2 dated 3 August 2020 as prepared by Cudd Bentley Consulting Limited; Overheating Assessment, document reference 5717_CBC_IF_RP_Z_001_P02 Revision 2 dated 7 August 2020 as prepared by Cudd Bentley Consulting Limited; Updated Accommodation Schedule dated 1 December 2020 as prepared by Darling Associates; and Stage 3 Fire Strategy document reference 510445.000 Issue 01 dated 28 October 2020 as prepared by Elementa Consulting;
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Non-Material Amendment (S.96a) to vary condition 2 approved plans, changes to landscaping, design and openings in relation to planning permission :181062OPDFUL dated 10.08.2021 for 'Demolition of existing buildings to provide 3 buildings comprising residential units and flexible commercial floorspace, the provision of public open space, roof top amenity space, landscaping, car and cycle parking and refuse storage'
